about_the_game:
NOTE: Although this game is fully released, please think of it as an Early Access Game. Only buy this game if you are okay with rough edges and bugs. I'll keep working on making improvements. Expect significant changes to game-play and features

About the Gameplay:

Those Left Behind is an action-horror game set in a city and its surrounding area shortly after a mysterious, global event transforms most people into flesh-eating monsters.

Take control of survivors who must venture out of their safe house every night in search of supplies. As the world becomes more and more dangerous, race against the clock to find a truly safe place.

UNLOCK NEW LOCATIONS

The world has violently torn itself apart, and the blood is still wet. Make your way through dangerous and carnage-filled environments to unlock new locations.

LOOK FOR SUPPLIES... AND OTHER SURVIVORS

Scavenge outside not only for essential supplies such as food and water, but also for materials to build up your home. Find other survivors to join your community and improve your chance of survival.

FIGHT TO SURVIVE

Vicious monsters want to tear you apart from limb-to-limb. Fight back with an assortment of melee weapons and guns, including axes, machetes, shotguns and rifles. Upgrade your community’s combat and scavenging abilities with points earned from felling your foes.

Some Game Features to Note:

  • Survivors have (light) backstories revealed by their "Journal Entries"
  • Survivors have statuses (Injury, Fatigue, Hunger, Sickness)
  • Survivors have traits (e.g. speed)
  • Survivors can equip body armor, shoes, and weapons
  • A trading system

content_descriptors.notes: This game has gore and violence. There is a lot of blood.

name: Those Left Behind

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Actual Minimum System Requirements May Be Lower
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8750H 2.2GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: A single player action-horror zombie game. Fight through dangerous environments to unlock new locations. Scavenge supplies to keep your survivors alive and to build your base.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
